p: Microencapsulation of C. zeylanicum leaf oil and garlic ( Allium sativum) oil in β-cyclodextrin was reported by Ayala-Zavala et al. [ 20]. The main components of C. zeylanicum leaf oil and garlic oil were eugenol (78%) and allyl disulfide (21%), respectively. The highest yields of C. zeylanicum leaf oil and garlic oil microencapsulation with β-cyclodextrin were obtained at the weight ratios of 16:84 and 12:88.
